channel.title: CVE Feed for Hetronic -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hetronic -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-19023|2024-08-05T11:23:08.922Z -- hetronic -- hetronic%20nova-m
item.description: Hetronic Nova-M prior to verson r161 uses fixed codes that are reproducible by sniffing and re-transmission. This can lead to unauthorized replay of a command, spoofing of an arbitrary message, or keeping the controlled load in a permanent "stop" state.
